name: Nubity Inc.
description: Developer of a centralized platform designed to integrate public and private cloud services. The company's platform integrates all the clouds and servers in a single interface that facilitates to management and monitor the infrastructure, enabling companies to monitor and delegate the administration and management of information technology infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a centralized platform designed to integrate public and private cloud services. The company's platform integrates all the clouds and servers in a single interface that facilitates to management and monitor the infrastructure, enabling companies to monitor and delegate the administration and management of information technology infrastructure.
